name: qr
description: Minimal 0-dep QR code generator & reader. Supports ascii, term, gif and svg formats

scripts.bench: cd test/benchmark && npm ci && node index.ts
scripts.test: cd test; npm ci; node --experimental-strip-types --no-warnings index.ts
scripts.test:bun: cd test; bun install; bun index.ts
scripts.test:deno: cd test; npm install; deno --allow-env --allow-read index.ts
scripts.test:node20: cd test; npx tsc; cd compiled/test; npm install; node index.js

author: Paul Miller (https://paulmillr.com)
